text: Kalasangham Films is an Indian film production and distribution company based in the Malayalam film industry. It was founded by M. M. Hamsa. It has since gone on to distribute several films in Malayalam and other regional Indian languages. ==Productions== {| class="wikitable" |- ! No. !! Film !! Year !! Director !!
